channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report E-2023100329
item.description:
Report E-2023100329

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-14T00:31:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-28
  • City: MERIDEN
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On September 28, 2023, one (1) 55-gallon drum of UN2014 was punctured by a forklift and released approximately one (1) gallon to the trailer floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Kropp Environmental Contractors (KEC) to remediate the impacted site. Crews collected the damaged 55-gallon drum and placed in in a 95-gallon over pack drum for disposal. Crews deployed granular absorbents to the impacted trailer floor and worked them in with hand tools. All hydrogen peroxide impacted material was collected and containerized in one (1) 95-gallon drum and added to R+L's waste stream for disposal.

item.title: Report X-2023090622
item.description:
Report X-2023090622
